official-title.#text: To authorize the Commissioner of Food and Drugs to waive or reduce certain fees applicable to generic drug facilities where the fees would present a significant barrier to market entry because of limited resources available to such facilities or other circumstances.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Waiver or reduction of certain fees applicable to generic drug facilities

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 744B of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B
Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B/ss:b/p:1/sp:B
Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B/ss:c/p:3
Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B/ss:a/p:2..4

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , by adding at the end the following:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B/ss:c

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall grant to a person that owns a generic drug facility a waiver from or a reduction of one or more fees assessed to that person under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: finds that the assessment of the fee would present a significant barrier to market entry because of limited resources available to such person or other circumstances.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B/ss:c/p:3/sp:A

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall consider only the circumstances and assets of the person involved and any affiliate of the person.

text.#text: In determining whether to grant a waiver or reduction of a fee under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , a person shall submit to the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:744B/ss:c/p:3/sp:A

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: a written request for such waiver or reduction not later than 180 days after the fee is due.

text.#text: To qualify for consideration for a waiver or reduction under

term.#tail: means a person that owns a facility which is identified or intended to be identified in at least one generic drug submission that is pending or approved to produce one or more finished dosage forms of a human generic drug.
term.#text: person that owns a generic drug facility

text.#text: The amendments made by this section apply with respect to fees authorized to be assessed and collected for any of fiscal years 2014 through 2017.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3631 IH: Small Manufacturer Protection Act of 2013
